title: Best of The Program | Guests: Tom Fitton & Christopher Rufo | 9/15/20
description:
Judicial Watch president Tom Fitton calls for President Trump to declare a “transparency emergency” as reports surface of issues with ActBlue donations and other possible cover-ups. City Journal contributing editor Christopher Rufo just exposed how the CDC ignored Trump’s order to end critical race theory trainings. The agency has just complied, but is that enough? Glenn bought FDR’s wheelchair without his wife’s knowledge and has to come clean.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
